name: City Highway Car Racing
description:
City Highway Car Racing: 3d Game is very interesting, challenging and simple. City Highway Car Racing: 3d is very thrilling car racing game drive sports cars on wide roads at illegal speed and drift. So you can drive the 3D endless fast drive Cars on different road tracks. You have been hit by auto Hi-Speed on amazing Track Race. You will have to show you crazy driving skills to win the race and beat your opponents.

City Highway Car Racing: 3d is Provide the 3D high quality graphic, Different city Environments, racing tracks and racing sound to the user. There are 5 sports and unbeatable racing cars available in garage, you can select your favorite car for impossible tracks car race. Jump over the slide and ride on fast speed to won the race and become the racing champion of 2017.

This car stunt game has 3 Different racing chapters; every chapter has 6 challenging tracks. Press accelerator for turbo speed and get 4 stars and become furious racer. Play each thrilling mission with fast sports cars to unlock next challenge.

How to PlayCity Highway Car Racing: 3d

First of all you select the super fast 3d car, and paint the car which is your favorite color and now you ready for the crazy 3d car race. Tap on the race and go fast challenging other cars on track use the nitro, jump the car and get more nitro and won the challenging level. When you go fast on the mountain roads turn with drift. City Highway Car Racing: 3d will give you an unparalleled fast racing experience. Crazy 3d car driver game is different from the other boring type racing game. Crazy 3d car racing simulation game no need a break and not fear a police your job is that go fast, faster ultimate the fast car. You need a buy more crazy car for the next level.

Crazy top car speed game is totally different to others 3d drift racing drive games. You will feel that’s not a boring game, hope so you will enjoy this game.

City Highway Car Racing: 3d Features:

Multiple racing track with jumping slide
Different fast speed cars
Easy and Simple Play
Smooth & soft control
3d Graphics & real sound
Environment is Real Mountain, desert and city racing tracks
Use nitro for more fast speed
Purchase the Crazy cars
Different chapter of race and different level of racing track
Optimized game size
No Registration required
Free game for the android device
No limit the age for drive furious cars
